T02D2821:170b-0: @170b * // jo bo thugs rje chen po nad thams cad las
T02D2821:170b-1: rnam par rgyal ba gzi brjid kyi rgyal po la
T02D2821:170b-2: phyag 'tshal lo // 'jig rten gsum dbang rnam par rgyal //
T02D2821:170b-3: 'gro ba'i nad ni sna tshogs dang //
T02D2821:170b-4: de rgyu nye dang ring ba bstsal //
T02D2821:170b-5: ma lus pha rol phyin phyag 'tshal //
T02D2821:170b-6: blo ldan bdag gam gzhan gyi don //
T02D2821:170b-7: rtsol ba che la zhugs pa na //
T02D2821:170b-8: dgra dang gdon nyid dang las dang //
T02D2821:170b-9: de bzhin rkyen gzhan nad skyed byed //
T02D2821:170b-10: de la dpal ldan spyan ras gzigs //
T02D2821:170b-11: sdug bsngal can la thugs brtse bas //
T02D2821:170b-12: srung dang skyob dang sbeng rim bzhin //
T02D2821:170b-13: snying dbus spyi bo phyag mtshan bshad //
T02D2821:170b-14: rlung mkhris bad kan 'dus pa nyid //
T02D2821:170b-15: 'og ma'i rims drag sna tshogs rigs //
T02D2821:170b-16: mdze can dang ni skran dmu chu //
T02D2821:170b-17: thibs non la sogs kun nges skyob //
T02D2821:170b-18: sgrub po dad ldan byams yid brlan //
T02D2821:170b-19: pho brang mchog tu bltas pa de //
T02D2821:170b-20: khrus byas gos dkar bzang gyon la //
T02D2821:170b-21: tshangs pa'i gnas pas legs gnas bya //
T02D2821:170b-22: sna tshogs mchod mdzes dpag med dang //
T02D2821:170b-23: 'byung po rnams kyis don grub rdzas //
T02D2821:170b-24: stobs can dkar dmar mang dang ldan //
T02D2821:170b-25: bdug pa mchog gis bdag gus mchod //
T02D2821:170b-26: aom a'a: hr'i:sarba by'a dhi pra ti pra ha na h'um phat sb'a h'a /
T02D2821:170b-27: bdag nyid 'dab skyes stong dbus su //
T02D2821:170b-28: ji skad 'byung ba'i rgyal ba nyid //
T02D2821:170b-29: 'od dpag med kyi snying por bcas //
T02D2821:170b-30: dkar gsal rnam par me g-yeng ba'o //
T02D2821:170b-31: da nas dad pa drag gdung bcas //
T02D2821:170b-32: 'gro la brtse dang gzhan ltos med //
T02D2821:171a-1: tu rnam par nges yid kyis //
T02D2821:171a-2: skyabs gsol mgon po spyan drang bya //
T02D2821:171a-3: dpag med sprin tshogs mchod pa'i lhas //
T02D2821:171a-4: lha mchog mdun du bdar nas ni //
T02D2821:171a-5: ring par thub chen 'khor mang bcas //
T02D2821:171a-6: brtse phyir steng gi mkhar bzhugs blta //
T02D2821:171a-7: me tog spos dang mar me dri bzang ro brgya'i bza' dang lhab lhub gos mang rgyan mchog dang //
T02D2821:171a-8: pi wang dung dang rnga chen gling bu dbyangs snyan 'tsher ba sna tshogs mchod pa'i lha mor bcas //
T02D2821:171a-9: ji ltar sangs rgyas kun du bzang sogs ji snyed mchod mdzad bdag gi'ang zab cing rgya che sprul //
T02D2821:171a-10: de rjes gzhan yang bstod dbyangs kun brjod mi bzad yid kyi nongs pa ma lus yang dag bshags //
T02D2821:171a-11: de nas dad pa mang ldan dang //
T02D2821:171a-12: skye dgu rnams la snying brtse bas //
T02D2821:171a-13: yid bzhin nor la nyer mkho bzhin //
T02D2821:171a-14: sna tshogs nad las bsrung gsol bya //
T02D2821:171a-15: bdag gi lus dang lhag bsam nyid //
T02D2821:171a-16: drang srong gi ni thugs rje dang //
T02D2821:171a-17: smon lam stobs kyis mdzad pa yi //
T02D2821:171a-18: byin rlabs bdud rtsi'i rgyun 'bab gyur //
T02D2821:171a-19: rnga yab dkar brgya ser bu'i ngad bskyod brtan par mi nus g-yo bar byed //
T02D2821:171a-20: mtsho chen gting zab drag po rdzis 'khrug lha dbang thugs kyang btsun mos bzhu //
T02D2821:171a-21: tsha bsil zer can nyi zla 'bar ba'ang rta bdun rlung g-yos gnas gcig min //
T02D2821:171a-22: de bzhin nyid thugs rnyog med zhi ba'ang gdul bya'i don mthong rnam pa kun du mi bzad 'gyur //
T02D2821:171a-23: de tshe dbang phyug thugs dkyil du //
T02D2821:171a-24: bdag gi lha mos bde bsnun pas //
T02D2821:171a-25: thugs rje'i thugs bskyod byin rlabs rgyun //
T02D2821:171a-26: bdud rtsi'i rgyun ltar dkar phreng dbab //
T02D2821:171a-27: g-yas phyag ming med rtse nas su //
T02D2821:171a-28: zla ba kha ba kunda dung //
T02D2821:171a-29: padma dkar mdog las lhag pa //
T02D2821:171a-30: yul dus rnam kun bar ma chad //
T02D2821:171a-31: rgyun bzang spyi gtsug rtsa mchog nas brgyud nas //
T02D2821:171a-32: snying dkyil lha mchog nyid sku gang byas la //
T02D2821:171a-33: ches lhag zer kun lus kun rgyas gyur dang //
T02D2821:171a-34: de las 'od phyung 'dom gang dkyil 'khor bskor //
T02D2821:171a-35: gang tshe gnyid log 'du byed g-yengs gyur na //
T02D2821:171a-36: g-yon phyag nyid kyi padmo bdag 'byin la //
T02D2821:171a-37: de dbus bdag bzhugs 'dab stong ldan //
T02D2821:171a-38: slar zum spyi bo'i phrag nas bdud rtsi blang //
